name: project-cerebro
description: Project Cerebro aims to re-envision the "CEO Dashboard" as a comprehensive **agent runtime and execution control surface**. Instead of a static task board, Cerebro provides a dynamic interface for managing autonomous "Brains" (specialized agents) that operate on a formal, stateful execution graph driven by heartbeats. The primary goal is to shift from manual task management to overseeing an autonomous system that executes, recovers, and reports on its own work.
